body_html:
Not test yet but I think so. TensorFlow has implemented the C++ filesystem interfaces which is used for almost all data interface. Now it supports to read data from HDFS, it's really possible to support writing into HDFS.

@qingzew It would be great to test by yourself or ask in StackOverview/Google group/Mail list instead of opening an issue 😃
body_text:
Not test yet but I think so. TensorFlow has implemented the C++ filesystem interfaces which is used for almost all data interface. Now it supports to read data from HDFS, it's really possible to support writing into HDFS.
@qingzew It would be great to test by yourself or ask in StackOverview/Google group/Mail list instead of opening an issue 😃
body:
Not test yet but I think so. TensorFlow has implemented the C++ filesystem interfaces which is used for almost all data interface. Now it supports to read data from HDFS, it's really possible to support writing into HDFS.

@qingzew It would be great to test by yourself or ask in StackOverview/Google group/Mail list instead of opening an issue 😃
